Text: Why doesn't the "community" take this show seriously? Where is the 720p?

Still actually season 11 not 12.

And yes, I'll mention it on every torrent... ^^

@Vuori: By what system do you base your statement? The wikipedia page lists this as Season 12, the IMDB page lists it as 14, and the Mythbusters themselves seem to go by year, and not arbitrarily designated season numbers.

@amoeba: You should recheck the wikipedia page. They've split the pilot episodes form the rest of the 2003-season of Mythbusters.

And as I mentioned in the previous torrent:

As was stated last episode it was the TENTH anniversary of Mythbusters so this is season 11 considering it started on season 1 not 0.
 Mythbusters seasons are counted by air-year officially like 2012-season or 2013-season. 2013-season = s11.
 So there!

Except that the MBs themselves during at least one episode last year that it was then season 11. Before that seasons were indeed simply by year since there weren't any official seasons at all. But those statements last year threw everything into confusion (a confusion which obviously lingers).

That means this is either the second half of season 11 after a long break, or the beginning of season 12 – I haven't heard anyone official say one way or the other. Like most everyone else, I've been considering season 12 since many months have gone by since the episodes that were officially season 11 aired.

Remember too that /Castle/, which has only been on the air for four years (and a bit more than two months), has nevertheless just wrapped up its fifth season. Years have very little to do with seasons anymore, and everything to do with the whims of corporate bigwigs.

@tiss13 - What bothers me is when a show is available in 1080p and is only torrented in 720p.  That has almost driven me to insanity many times - esp. when there's an awesome crotch or ass shot and you need every delicious pixel of sexy hotness.
